DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Making Healthy Decisions design rigorously evaluate new sexual health education program , `` Your Move '' ( YM ) nutrition control program , `` Eat Smart '' ( ES ) . YM intend improve teen female ' ( age 14-19 ) ability make healthy sexual decision ultimate goal reduce unplanned pregnancy STIs .
DOC.detailed_description: Making Healthy Decisions include two technology-based intervention design improve teen female ' healthy decision make relation sexual relationship ( YM ) nutrition ( ES ) . Health educator Planned Parenthood train implement YM ES youth-serving community organization geographic area across several U.S. state . In multi-site randomized control trial , female age 14-19 recruited local community-based organization ( CBO ) groups/cohorts 8-12 . Each cohort randomly assign participate one two intervention prior baseline data collection . Participants attend seven 75-minute program session include facilitator-led game , activity , discussion well personal reflection time girl practice healthy decision make individually electronic tablet . Self-reported survey data related attitude , knowledge , behavior around sex nutrition collect baseline well 3 month 9 month intervention end .
